entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
